Ramez Mohamed Galal Ahmed Tawufik (Arabic; a mụrụ n'abalị iri abụọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 1973) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe ọchị, onye na-eme egwuregwu na onye na-agụ egwu. Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Egyptian Academy of Arts
Ramez Galal bụ nwa nwoke nke onye nduzi ihe nkiri Galal Tawfik na nwanne Yasser Galal nke obere. Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na ụlọ akwụkwọ praịmarị Kasr Al Tefl wee kwaga ụlọ akwụkwọ El Orman
Ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị ya bụ El Giza
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, Galal kpebiri isonyere ụlọ akwụkwọ maka ihe nkiri, ngalaba ime ihe nkiri na iduzi
Galal banyere n'ọrụ agha mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, wee laghachi n'ime ihe nkiri
Na mbido ọrụ ya, o nwetara ohere iso onye na-eme ihe nkiri a ma ama Salah Zulfikar na ihe nkiri TV dị mkpirikpi nke afọ 1993 "Al-Rajul Al-Tayeb"
N'afọ 2014 ọ pụtara na mgbasa ozi TV maka Zain.

N'ihe ngosi ya, nke a na-egosi n'oge Ramadan, a na-ahụ ndị ọbịa Galal na egwu maka ndụ ha. Ọ na-eme ndị Egypt a ma ama na ndị ama ama dịka Paris Hilton, Steven Seagal, na Shah Rukh Khan. Mmeghachi omume nke Shah Rukh Khan n'oge ihe ngosi ahụ, bụ vidiyo YouTube nke anọ kachasị ewu ewu n'izu mbụ nke Ramadan afọ 2017. N'agbanyeghị na ihe ngosi ya na-ewu ewu, Galal enwetala nkatọ
Otu onye na-ekwu maka ikike ụmụ anụmanụ mere mkpesa na a na-eme ka ọdụm dị jụụ maka ihe ngosi ahụ

Onye nkatọ ọzọ kwuru na "mkparị" nke na-efe mgbe a na-akụ ndị ọbịa ya na-emebi aha Egypt. N'afọ 2020, onye isi oche Zamalek bụ Mortada Mansour gbara akwụkwọ na-achọ ka a kwụsị ihe ngosi Ramez Magnoon Rasmy (Ramez bụ Officially Crazy).
N'ajụjụ ọnụ na-atụle mwakpo Minya nke afọ 2017 ebe e gburu Ndị Kraịst 29, gụnyere ụmụaka, na-aga ebe obibi ndị mọnk na Minya, Galal malitere anya mmiri na-akọwa mmetụta ya banyere ọdachi ahụ.
